original_text: But if a man come presumptuously upon his neighbour, to slay him with guile; thou shalt take him from mine altar, that he may die.
korean_text: 사람이 그의 이웃을 고의로 죽였으면 너는 그를 내 제단에서라도 잡아내려 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: But if a man come presumptuously
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 한 사람이 건방지게 나아오면

sentences.original_text: thou shalt take him from mine altar
